sentences.en: A noncompetitive antagonist prevents the agonist from producing any effect at a given receptor site.
sentences.cn: 非竞争性拮抗剂可阻止激动剂在特定受体部位产生任何效应.

sentences.en: Amiodarone also acts as a thyroid hormone receptor antagonist.
sentences.cn: 胺碘酮也可作为甲状腺激素受体拮抗剂.

sentences.en: Conclusion The long acting dihydropyridine calcium antagonist will have wide market prospect.
sentences.cn: 结论长效二氢吡啶类钙拮抗剂具有广阔的市场前景.

sentences.en: He serves as the main antagonist of the film.
sentences.cn: 他担任影片的主要拮抗剂.

sentences.en: He wondered what his antagonist was doing.
sentences.cn: 他不知道他的敌手在做些什么.

sentences.en: His antagonist in the debate was quicker than he.
sentences.cn: 在辩论中他的对手比他反应快.

sentences.en: Leukotriene receptor antagonist is a new drug to treat allergic rhinitis.
sentences.cn: 白三烯受体拮抗剂是治疗变应性鼻炎的一种新的有效药物.

sentences.en: Naltrexone hydrochloride is a new morphine - like antagonist in our country now.
sentences.cn: 盐酸纳曲酮是目前国内新的吗啡类拮抗药.

sentences.en: Spassky had never previously lost to his antagonist.
sentences.cn: 斯帕斯基以往从未输给过他的对手。

sentences.en: The faint disdain of her smile seemed to lift her high above her antagonist's reach.
sentences.cn: 她那淡淡的,倨傲的笑容似乎使她位于对手无法触及的高度.

sentences.en: The sale amount of H _ 2 - antagonist, ranitidine is reported in the lead.
sentences.cn: H_ 2- 拮抗剂如雷尼替丁的销售额仍居领先地位.

sentences.en: The thing is to know the nature of your antagonist.
sentences.cn: 要紧的是要了解你的对手的特性.

sentences.en: This is how most fans considered Gian to antagonist of this story.
sentences.cn: 这正是为什么所有书迷都视胖虎为故事中的坏蛋.

sentences.en: We both thought the best resource was flight, when pursued by so formidable an antagonist.
sentences.cn: 我们俩都认为被这么一位可怕的对手盯着, 三十六计走为上策.

sentences.en: When bending the elbow the triceps are the antagonist.
sentences.cn: 屈臂时,肱三头肌为对抗肌.

words.tran_cn: 敌对的；对抗性的；反对的
使…敌对；使…对抗；对…起反作用

trans.tran_en: your opponent in a competition, battle, quarrel etc
